attributes.action: to stop benfits/allowances to pensioners that do not live in this country and to stop all foreign aid until we are out of recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is ridiculous to pay winter fuel allowances to pensioners that live in warm climates also that we are still committed to giving foreign aid and to fund any more immigrants and asylum seekers whilst this country is in such a financial mess.
